item.title: Incarceration + Crime

item.title: Employment
item.description: /* this chunnk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } body { text-align: justify } Examples Page If you want to add in an image on an Rmd file, use this link here. It ends up being a little tricky, but as long as you have created a folder to insert your images, you can just use some markdown code or html to insert images in the format you want.

item.title: Accessibility
item.description: Our ecological model framework encouraged us to consider how these various factors may interact in their effects on re-entry for formely incarcerated individuals in Halifax County. A key component of each factor is resource accessibliity: employment opportunities, availabile affordable housing options, and support for those with substance abuse problems are all rendered irrelevant if these resources are not accessible to those who rely on them.
